snippet: The driver and others died in the explosion, but a pregnant woman en route to a health clinic for delivery survived and gave birth hours later, officials said.
abstract: Roadside bomb explosion strikes an ambulance in a usually peaceful area of northern Afghanistan, killing at least three passengers and the driver.

byline.original: By SANGAR RAHIMI and ALISSA J. RUBIN
byline.contributor: Sangar Rahimi reported from Kabul, Afghanistan, and Alissa J. Rubin from Kunduz.

lead_paragraph: The driver and others died in the explosion, but a pregnant woman en route to a health clinic for delivery survived and gave birth hours later, officials said.

headline.seo: Bomb Strikes Ambulance in Usually Calm Afghan Area
headline.main: Bomb Hits Ambulance in Usually Calm Afghan Area
headline.print_headline: Fatal Blast Strikes Ambulance In Usually Calm Afghan Area
